Add.Name: ListOptions
Add.Label: ListOptions
Add.HelpText: Additional data to show when displaying news items in a list, such as the date, teaser, news story, RSS link. (By default the date and the teaser are displayed.)
Add.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector"><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="Show date,Show teaser,Show description,Show RSS link" /></f:function></f:param><f:param name="Multiple" value="True" /></f:widgetfunction>

Add.Name: ItemOptions
Add.Label: ItemOptions
Add.HelpText: Additional data to show when displaying a single news item, such as the date, teaser, news story, share icons. (By default the date, content, share icons and 'Back to News' link are displayed.)
Add.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector"><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="Show date,Show teaser,Show description,Show share icons,Show 'Back to News' link" /></f:function></f:param><f:param name="Multiple" value="True" /></f:widgetfunction>
Add.DefaultValueFunctionMarkup: <f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Constant.String"><f:param name="Constant" value="Show date,Show description,Show share icons,Show 'Back to News' link" /></f:function>

Add.Name: PageSize
Add.Label: Page Size
Add.HelpText: The number of items to display on the page ("10" by default).

Add.Name: DateFormat
Add.Label: Date Format
Add.HelpText: Custom C#-compliant date format (e.g. "dddd, MMMM dd, yyyy").

Add.Name: Count
Add.Label: Count of items
Add.HelpText: The number of items to display on the page ("5" by default).

Add.Name: Options
Add.Label: Options
Add.HelpText: Additional data to show in the news list such as the date and the teaser. (By default, the date and the teaser are displayed.)
Add.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector"><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="Show date,Show teaser" /></f:function></f:param><f:param name="Multiple" value="True" /></f:widgetfunction>

Add.Name: DateFormat
Add.Label: Date Format
Add.HelpText: Custom C#-compliant date format (e.g. "dddd, MMMM dd, yyyy").
